meanings.definition: Disconnecting or separating from a fixed point or object.
meanings.sent1: She was untethering the phone charger from the wall to take it with her.
meanings.sent2: The astronaut was untethering himself from the spaceship to float in space.
meanings.sent3: He untethered the helium balloon and watched it fly away, untamed and free.
